[vc_row][vc_column]

Injection Moulding Machine

[vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]WASHUN Machinery has strongly determined the development of the Injection Moulding Machines, as a specialist company for the manufacturing of different range of the injection moulding machines for plastics processing. WASHUN Machinery has 3 production locations in China and more than 400 employees develop and manufacture a range of hybrid and hydraulic injection moulding machines with clamping forces ranging from 770 kN to 12,500 kN.

At present,WASHUNoffers three range of the the injection molding machines, The PET Master Preform Moulding System is specialized machine for the high speed preform moulding production line. The MG Series Injection Moulding Machines is generally hydraulic driven machine, and the PET Injection molding machines is designed for the small to medium cavity preform moulds.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4316″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/pet-injection-moulding-machines/”]

PET Injection Moulding Machines
[vc_column_text]WASHUN has involved with the PET Prefrom molding system since late 80th, According to the experience of the building the preform tools,[More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4306″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/mg-series-injection-moulding-machines/”]
MG Series Injection Moulding Machines
[vc_column_text]The diversified range of injection molding machines in WASHUN Machinery, It covers all the applications in the standard sector,[More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”4530″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_outline” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://www.megamachinery.com/portfolio/mg-series-injection-moulding-machines-2/”]
MG Series Injection Moulding Machines (More models)
[vc_column_text]With clamping forces between 600 and 125,000, with the high performance of the injection molding machine and less pricing,[More][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
